DOC.brief_summary: This crossover Study investigate effect Formoterol versus Salmeterol small airway physiological parameter COPD patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Effect Formoterol v Salmeterol Small Airways Physiological Parameters COPD Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A Single-centre , Double-blind , Double-dummy , Randomised , Crossover Study investigate effect Formoterol HFA-pMDI versus Salmeterol HFA-pMDI small airway physiological parameter COPD patient .
DOC.criteria: Patients clinical diagnosis COPD Post bronchodilator FEV1 30 % 80 % predict value screen Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 0.7 Positive FEV1 reversibility test : FEV1 change great 200 mL 12 % History another medical condition contraindicate participation study Clinical evidence heart failure
